metadata.title: CVE-2024-1299 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: A privilege escalation vulnerability was discovered in GitLab affectingversions 16.8 prior to 16.8.4 and 16.9 prior to 16.9.2. It was possible fora user with custom role of `manage_group_access_tokens` to rotate groupaccess tokens with owner privileges.

criterions.comment: gitlab package in xenial is affected and may need fixing.
